participant_1.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

participant_2.background:
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.
I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.
i work in retail.
i traveled around the world in a boat.
i like being by myself.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing alright! I'm happy to be chatting with someone new.
Me too! I'm always up for a good conversation.
What do you do for fun?
I like to travel, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I like to travel too, but I don't get to do it as often as I'd like.
I understand. It can be expensive to travel.
What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I have to say that my favorite place was when I traveled around the world in a boat. It was an amazing experience.
Wow, that must have been incredible! I've never been on a boat that big.
It was! It was a lot of work, but it was worth it.
I'm sure it was. What was the best part of the trip?
I think the best part was the people I met along the way. I met people from all over the world, and it was so interesting to learn about their cultures.
That sounds like a really amazing experience. I'm glad you had a chance to do it.
Thank you! I'm glad I got to share it with you.
